channel.title: CVE Feed for Softnext -- Mail SQR Expert
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Softnext -- Mail SQR Expert

item.title: CVE-2023-48378|2024-10-08T14:16:25.159Z -- softnext -- mail%20sqr%20expert
item.description: Softnext Mail SQR Expert has a path traversal vulnerability within its parameter in a specific URL. An unauthenticated remote attacker can exploit this vulnerability to bypass authentication and download arbitrary system files.
